title: Open-Source LLM Gets 4× Faster With FlashAttention-3
summary: A research team integrated FA-3 kernels into a popular OSS model, reporting 4× speed-ups on long contexts.

title: Meta Publishes New Long-Context Recipe
summary: Technique mixes sliding-window attention with RoPE scaling to reach 256k tokens without major quality loss.

title: MLOps: Inference Cost Cuts With Speculative Decoding
summary: Production teams report 20–40% latency and cost reductions by pairing a small draft model with a large target model.

title: Vector DBs Add Hybrid Search Defaults
summary: Leading vendors now enable hybrid (lexical + vector) search as the out-of-the-box mode for more robust retrieval.

title: Agents: Guardrails Libraries Ship Policy Packs
summary: Prebuilt policies for prompt injection, data exfiltration, and tool abuse make it easier to ship safer agents.

title: Eval Suites Standardize RAG Benchmarks
summary: New community suites measure retrieval quality, grounding, and hallucination rates on multi-domain corpora.
